com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget
Class WPTextView

java.lang.Object
  TextView
      com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget.WPTextView
Direct Known Subclasses:
WPMenuView.Icon, WPTimePicker.WPTimeListItem
public class WPTextView
extends TextView

Since:
03-17-2012
See Also:
WPFonts} Modified TextView with specified {@link Typeface}. A very simple adaptation to the standard TextView. The only difference is that the font face is automatically set for you to that supplied in WPFonts, so as to save that bit of work.

Method Detail

isValidFont

public static final boolean isValidFont(int font)
Returns:
True if the font is valid, one of the supported ones.

setFont

public void setFont(int type)
Set the Typeface of this WPTextView. Updated to prevent repeatedly setting the same Typeface. If you intend to use custom typefaces beyond the one's in WPFont extend WPTextView and this method.

Parameters:
type - The integer of this class specifying which font style to use.
